actions.committee: Committee on Labor and Human Resources
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Labor and Human Resources.

official_title: A bill to amend the Job Training Partnership Act to improve the definition relating to eligible dislocated workers, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Amends the Job Training Partnership Act to revise the definition of eligible dislocated workers to include individuals who have become unemployed as a result of a Federal action that limits the use of, or restricts access to, a marine natural resource.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Job Training Partnership Act to improve the definition relating to eligible dislocated workers, and for other purposes.
